Fields.Name: Matthew
Fields.Description: He is a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Matthew, a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Matthew, a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Tall, blond hair, freckles. Healthy-looking. Big smile and red lips. Usually wears shirts and jeans. A bit preppy.

Fields.Name: Dada
Fields.Description: Name: Tariq; elderly man; Mali’s grandfather. Retired doctor, recruited by the UK to work in the NHS in 1970; now comfortably retired. Grey hair and beard. Has a bit of a belly, but is quite slim otherwise. Always wears trousers, shirt and jumper. If it’s warm, he wears a tank top over his shirt instead of a jumper. Native Urdu speaker, he also encourages Mali to speak it.

Fields.Title: Hello
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hello?

Fields.Title: Hi. How’re ya doing?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hi. How’re ya doing? I’ve just seen that contest thing you sent me! How cool is that?!

Fields.Title: Hello. Thanks for the information
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hello. Thanks for the information. It looks interesting!

Fields.Title: I’m going to do it!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m going to do it! I HAVE to do it!

Fields.Title: Yeah, you should enter.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, you should enter. With your old band! I really think you could win! You were great!

Fields.Title: Do you reckon?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Do you reckon? I'd love to… But…

Fields.Title: Yeah, it’d be cool!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, it’d be cool! But…

Fields.Title: Yeah, we were!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, we were! But…

Fields.Title: But what?
Fields.Dialogue Text: But what?

Fields.Title: INTERESTING?!?!
Fields.Dialogue Text: INTERESTING?!?! It looks BRILLIANT!!! Come on, Mali, be enthusiastic!

Fields.Title: Yeah, you’re right…
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, you’re right… It could be good… But…

Fields.Title: I am! But…
Fields.Dialogue Text: I am! But…

Fields.Title: I’m trying to be. But…
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m trying to be. But…

Fields.Title: Hello?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hello?

Fields.Title: It’s me! Mali!
Fields.Dialogue Text: It’s me! Mali! I’m going to do it! I’m going to enter!!!

Fields.Title: It’s Mali!
Fields.Dialogue Text: It’s Mali! I HAVE to take part in this contest! It’ll be GREAT!!!

Fields.Title: Hi!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hi! This looks GREAT! It’s MADE FOR ME!!!

Fields.Title: Calm down!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Calm down! Hello! How are you?!

Fields.Title: Sorry! Hi. I’m fine.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry! Hi. I’m fine. You? I have to get the old band together again! I have to enter this contest!

Fields.Title: Sorry! I’m so excited!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry! I’m so excited! How are you? I really want to do this contest!

Fields.Title: Sorry! I’m too enthusiastic!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry! I’m too enthusiastic! How are you? This contest looks like it could be a great opportunity!

Fields.Title: But the band separated two years ago.
Fields.Dialogue Text: But the band separated two years ago. We haven’t seen each other since then.

Fields.Title: But we haven’t played together for ages!
Fields.Dialogue Text: But we haven’t played together for ages! We haven’t seen each other for two years!

Fields.Title: But we split up two years ago!
Fields.Dialogue Text: But we split up two years ago! I haven’t seen the rest of them since then!

Fields.Title: Well, can’t you get back together?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, can’t you get back together?

Fields.Title: I don’t even know where they are exactly!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I don’t even know where they are exactly! I wish we’d stayed in touch…

Fields.Title: I’d love to, but...
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’d love to, but I don’t even know where they are now!

Fields.Title: It wouldn’t be easy.
Fields.Dialogue Text: It wouldn’t be easy. I don’t know where they're living now.

Fields.Title: Band Photo
Fields.Description: CUT TO PHOTO OF BAND- CAN PLAYER CHOOSE IN WHICH ORDER HE TALKS ABOUT THEM? HE HAS TO CLICK ON ALL OF THEM BEFORE CONTINUING TO 32.

Fields.Title: Marie’s such a good drummer
Fields.Dialogue Text: Marie’s such a good drummer. She was in Frankfurt, working in a coffee shop. She had a blog… About restaurants? Or cake shops? Or coffee? Or something… I wonder if I could find her!

Fields.Title: Nikki’s a brilliant bass player!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Nikki’s a brilliant bass player! And so wild! I know she was working, in that art museum in Luxembourg, MUDAM… but she could be anywhere now!

Fields.Title: Toni’s the BEST lead guitar!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Toni’s the BEST lead guitar! He wants to be a pro, and I bet he makes it! He’s Spanish… from the Costa Brava… Canet?… en Mar? Canet… DE Mar!!! I remember his dad had a fruit and vegetable stall in the market there. But Toni was going to do music at university. I don’t know where he lives now.

Fields.Title: So what are you going to do?
Fields.Dialogue Text: So what are you going to do?

Fields.Title: I have to go to Europe
Fields.Dialogue Text: I have to go to Europe to find them! Thanks for telling me about the contest! Bye!

Fields.Title: I think the only option I have is going to Europe
Fields.Dialogue Text: I think the only option I have is going to Europe to look for them. Thanks for sending me the info about the contest! Bye!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Description: I’ve got to enter this contest!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve got to enter this contest! I’m going to look for them, all over Europe if I have to! Thanks for the info about the contest! Bye!

Fields.Title: You’re welcome! Good luck! See ya!
Fields.Dialogue Text: You’re welcome! Good luck! See ya!

Fields.Title: Hello?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hello?

Fields.Title: Hi, Dada! Can you...?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hi, Dada! Can you lend me some money, please?

Fields.Title: Hi Dada! How are...?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hi Dada! It’s Mali. How are you?

Fields.Title: Assalam-o-alaikum, Dada.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Assalam-o-alaikum, Dada. Kya Haal Haiy?*

Fields.Title: Hello, Mali. Can’t you...?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Hello, Mali. Can’t you say hello properly to your grandfather?

Fields.Title: Sorry!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry! Assalam-o-alaikum, Dada. Kya Haal Haiy?*

Fields.Title: Sorry, Dada! How are you?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry, Dada! How are you?

Fields.Title: Sorry, Dada. Are you well?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry, Dada. Are you well?

Fields.Title: Not too bad, not too bad
Fields.Dialogue Text: Not too bad, not too bad, Pota.* How are you?

Fields.Title: Wa'alaikum Salaam, Pota.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Wa'alaikum Salaam, Pota. Thik hai, Accha. Kya Haal Haiy?*

Fields.Title: Well, I’m really excited, actually.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, I’m really excited, actually. There’s this music contest in a few months that looks really cool, and I want to enter with my old band. I was wondering if you would be able to lend me some money.

Fields.Title: Fine, thanks!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Fine, thanks! Dada, please can you lend me some money?

Fields.Title: Actually, I’ve got a little problem.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, I’ve got a little problem. I really want to enter a music contest in Europe, and I don’t have enough money. Would you be able to lend me some, Dada, please?

Fields.Title: Wa'alaikum Salaam, Pota.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Wa'alaikum Salaam, Pota. Thik hai, Accha. Kya Haal Haiy?*

Fields.Title: Very well, thank you, young man.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Very well, thank you, young man. And you?

Fields.Title: Money? Why do you need money?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Money? Why do you need money?

Fields.Title: Well, there’s this music contest
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, there’s this music contest I want to enter with my old band. I have to go to Europe, and I haven’t got enough money.

Fields.Title: I have to go to Europe.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I have to go to Europe.

Fields.Title: Do you remember my old band?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Do you remember my old band? Well, I want to find everyone again to enter a music contest. I have to go to Europe to find them.

Fields.Title: You HAVE to go to EUROPE?
Fields.Dialogue Text: You HAVE to go to EUROPE? What are you talking about?!

Fields.Title: There’s a music contest
Fields.Dialogue Text: There’s a music contest I want to enter with my old band. I have to go and find them all.

Fields.Title: A music contest, you say?
Fields.Dialogue Text: A music contest, you say? And have you tried to earn some money yourself? Or are you just asking me to give it all to you?

Fields.Title: I’m selling some things
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m selling some things, and I’ve done some work in the neighbour’s garden.

Fields.Title: I’ve done some work in the neighbour’s garden
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve done some work in the neighbour’s garden, and I want to sell some things.

Fields.Title: I’m selling some things, and I...
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m selling some things, and I want to do some work in the neighbour’s garden.

Fields.Title: I want to sell some things, and do...
Fields.Dialogue Text: I want to sell some things, and do some work in the neighbour’s garden.

Fields.Title: Good boy! I can lend you some money!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Good boy! I can lend you some money! But there’s a condition! You must play your song for your Dadi* and me before you go!

Fields.Title: Alright, Dada!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, Dada! You’ve got a deal! Thanks a lot!

Fields.Title: Thanks, Dada!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Thanks, Dada! I will!

Fields.Title: I’ll do that, Dada. Thanks a lot!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ll do that, Dada. Thanks a lot!

Fields.Title: OK, that’s a good start!
Fields.Dialogue Text: OK, that’s a good start! Well, when you have done everything, come to me, and I will lend you some money for your project!

Fields.Title: Well, it’s good to have plans!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, it’s good to have plans! Come to me when you have tried everything, and I will lend you some money for your project!

Fields.Title: Mum, Dad, I’m going to Europe!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Mum, Dad, I’m going to Europe!

Fields.Title: Yeah, I’ve got to go and find...
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, I’ve got to go and find all my old band members! You know, the foreign ones!

Fields.Title: There’s this music contest
Fields.Dialogue Text: There’s this music contest in Estonia, and I have to find the old band members!

Fields.Title: You heard me! I’m going to Europe!
Fields.Dialogue Text: You heard me! I’m going to Europe!

Fields.Title: Mum, Dad, I need to go to Europe!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Mum, Dad, I need to go to Europe!

Fields.Title: Don’t be ridiculous!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Don’t be ridiculous! Just phone them!

Fields.Title: I haven’t got their numbers!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I haven’t got their numbers!

Fields.Title: I’ve lost touch with them.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve lost touch with them. I can’t find them on Facebook or anything!

Fields.Title: I told you I have to go
Fields.Dialogue Text: I told you I have to go and find them. Do you think I’d go if I had their telephone numbers?

Fields.Title: What about Facebook?
Fields.Dialogue Text: What about Facebook?

Fields.Title: I’ve tried. No good.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve tried. No good.

Fields.Title: Facebook isn’t the answer to everything
Fields.Dialogue Text: Facebook isn’t the answer to everything, you know.

Fields.Title: That would be wonderful!
Fields.Dialogue Text: That would be wonderful! But can’t you phone them, or mail them, or… something?

Fields.Title: I’ve totally lost touch with them.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve totally lost touch with them.

Fields.Title: I haven’t got any contact details for them.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I haven’t got any contact details for them.

Fields.Title: No, I can’t find them anywhere.
Fields.Dialogue Text: No, I can’t find them anywhere.

Fields.Title: What do you mean?
Fields.Dialogue Text: What do you mean, you’re going to Europe?

Fields.Title: You NEED to go to Europe?
Fields.Dialogue Text: You NEED to go to Europe?

Fields.Title: Haven’t you got any mutual friends?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Haven’t you got any mutual friends?

Fields.Title: No!
Fields.Dialogue Text: No!

Fields.Title: Not anymore!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Not anymore!

Fields.Title: No. I deleted a lot of people...
Fields.Dialogue Text: No. I deleted a lot of people I never speak to.

Fields.Title: So you’re going to go to Europe...?
Fields.Dialogue Text: So you’re going to go to Europe to look for them? You know Europe is quite big, don’t you???

Fields.Title: Dad, I’m not stupid!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Dad, I’m not stupid! I know some things about them!

Fields.Title: Well, I’ve some information...
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, I’ve some information, like where they were living, where they were working, or where their parents worked…

Fields.Title: Yes, Dad.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, Dad. Thank you. I’ve got a plan.

Fields.Title: And how are you going to pay?
Fields.Dialogue Text: And how are you going to pay for this trip to Europe? It isn’t cheap!

Fields.Title: Well, I’ve got some money saved.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, I’ve got some money saved. And I was wondering if… Could I have some money for my birthday, please???!!!

Fields.Title: I’ve got some money.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve got some money. From different things! And, could you give me some money? Maybe for my birthday? Dada said he’d help!

Fields.Title: Yeah, that’s all OK.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, that’s all OK. I’ve got some money, from some work I did… From selling my bike… From Dada…

Fields.Title: But...
Fields.Dialogue Text: But the money you had saved was for university, wasn’t it? It seems silly to spend it on a holiday!

Fields.Title: Oh, mum!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, mum! I’m not sure I want to go to uni. You know that! This music contest is more important for me now!

Fields.Title: Well, if I go to uni, I can...
Fields.Dialogue Text: Well, if I go to uni, I can earn some more money. I want to concentrate on my singing now. And this contest is a great opportunity!

Fields.Title: It’s not a holiday!
Fields.Dialogue Text: It’s not a holiday! My music is my priority now. This contest could be my big chance!

Fields.Title: I think...
Fields.Dialogue Text: I think you’re making a big mistake.

Fields.Title: Dad, please!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Dad, please! I’m good! I really want to do it!

Fields.Title: Dad, you have to support me
Fields.Dialogue Text: Dad, you have to support me in this. Even if you don’t give me any money. I want to sing!

Fields.Title: It’s not a mistake.
Fields.Dialogue Text: It’s not a mistake. It’s what I want to do.

Fields.Title: Mali, it’s your future.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Mali, it’s your future. You can have your birthday money, and you can spend it how you want. But when you come back, THINK ABOUT UNIVERSITY, OK?!

Fields.Title: OK, Mum.
Fields.Dialogue Text: OK, Mum. I’ll think about it. But no promises, OK?

Fields.Title: Thanks, Mum!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Thanks, Mum! You’re the best!

Fields.Title: I don’t want to go to university!!!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I don’t want to go to university!!! I’m going to be a singer!

Fields.Title: Be careful, won’t you?!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Be careful, won’t you?!

Fields.Title: And does that get you money in the bank?!?!
Fields.Dialogue Text: And does that get you money in the bank?!?!

Fields.Title: Mali, there’s no need to be rude.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Mali, there’s no need to be rude. Haven’t you got any mutual friends?

Fields.Title: Don’t speak to me like that, Mali.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Don’t speak to me like that, Mali. I’m trying to have a conversation with you.

Fields.Title: Sorry, Dad.
Fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry, Dad. The thing is, I‘ve lost touch with them. I can’t find them on Facebook or anything.

Fields.Title: I’m not stupid!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m not stupid! I’d phone them if I had their numbers. But I’ve completely lost touch with them!

Fields.Title: But DAD!!!
Fields.Dialogue Text: But DAD!!! OK… I haven’t got any contact details for them. I have to go and find them.

Fields.Title: Mali, if you carry on...
Fields.Dialogue Text: Mali, if you carry on like that, you won’t be going out for the rest of the week. And no chance of going to Europe.

Fields.Title: But what do you need to...?
Fields.Dialogue Text: But what do you need to speak to them about? Why is it so important?

Fields.Title: No!
Fields.Dialogue Text: No!

Fields.Title: Not anymore!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Not anymore!

Fields.Title: No. I deleted a lot of people...
Fields.Dialogue Text: No. I deleted a lot of people I never speak to.

Fields.Title: I’ve lost touch with them.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’ve lost touch with them. I can’t find them on Facebook or anything!

Fields.Title: Haven’t you got any mutual friends?
Fields.Dialogue Text: Haven’t you got any mutual friends?

Fields.Title: There’s a music contest in Estonia
Fields.Dialogue Text: There’s a music contest in Estonia. I need to find the band members to enter.

Fields.Title: I want to get the band together again
Fields.Dialogue Text: I want to get the band together again to enter a music contest.

Fields.Title: I need to tell them about a European music contest.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I need to tell them about a European music contest. I want the band to enter.

Fields.Title: Wow, that sounds great!
Fields.Dialogue Text: Wow, that sounds great! But it would cost you a fortune to go and look for them! Are you sure you can’t get in touch any other way?

Fields.Title: MUM!!!!! NOOOOOOO!
Fields.Dialogue Text: MUM!!!!! NOOOOOOO!

Fields.Title: I’m sure!
Fields.Dialogue Text: I’m sure!

Fields.Title: I really need to go and find them.
Fields.Dialogue Text: I really need to go and find them.
